data.comment: The big names in today's match at Camp Nou have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 4, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Barcelona throw-in in Osasuna's half.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Osasuna.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Osasuna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Osasuna at Camp Nou.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 8, Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards Osasuna a goal kick.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Osasuna.
In the minute 11, Barcelona's Philippe Coutinho is on target but unsuccessful.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Barcelona.
In the minute 13, Barcelona's Lionel Messi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Osasuna defender.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Barcelona drives forward and Lionel Messi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 16, Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Osasuna's half?
Antoine Griezmann of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Osasuna goal kick.
In the minute 18, In Barcelona Osasuna attack through Ante Budimir. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
Philippe Coutinho of Barcelona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 20, In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Attention is being given to Osasunaâ€™s Jony and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 23, The away team have replaced Jony with Juan Cruz. This is the first substitution made today by Jagoba Arrasate.
Osasuna to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
Throw-in Barcelona.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Philippe Coutinho for Barcelona gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 28, Osasuna have a goal kick.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Martin Braithwaite gives Barcelona a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Osasuna.
Osasuna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Barcelona.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Osasuna in the half of Barcelona.
Oier of Osasuna is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Osasuna in the half of Barcelona.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 42, Great finish from Antoine Griezmann to give Barcelona a 2-0 lead.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
In the minute 45, Barcelona's Philippe Coutinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Osasuna goal kick.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Barcelona.
In the minute 45, Barcelona have a dangerous throw-in.
Osasuna are pushing forward but Jon Moncayola's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
In the minute 45, Osasuna push forward at Camp Nou and Facundo Roncaglia gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Barcelona defence.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Camp Nou.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Osasuna throw-in in Barcelona's half.
Osasuna pushes forward through Ruben Garcia, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 46, Ronald Koeman (Barcelona) is making a first substitution, with Sergio Busquets replacing Pedri.
In the minute 48, Barcelona to take a throw-in in Osasuna territory.
Facundo Roncaglia gets his shot on target but fails to score for Osasuna.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 51, Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards Osasuna a goal kick.
Free kick Barcelona.
Barcelona are coming forward and Lionel Messi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Osasuna at Camp Nou.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards the away team a throw-in.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 57, Goal! Barcelona extend their lead to 3-0 through Philippe Coutinho.
Antoine Griezmann instrumental with a fine assist.
Osasuna have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
In the minute 59, Ante Budimir's header is off-target for Osasuna.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
Osasuna have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
In the minute 60, Raul Navas (Osasuna) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards Barcelona a goal kick.
The home team replace Martin Braithwaite with Trincao.
In the minute 61, Ronald Koeman is making the team's third substitution at Camp Nou with Ousmane Dembele replacing Philippe Coutinho.
Junior Firpo is replacing Sergino Dest for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Barcelona.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Osasuna in their own half.
Jagoba Arrasate (Osasuna) is making a second substitution, with Roberto Torres replacing Inigo Perez.
Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Osasuna's half?
In the minute 65, In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jagoba Arrasate is making the team's third substitution at Camp Nou with Darko Brasanac replacing Oier.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Barcelona to check on Clement Lenglet, who is grimacing with pain.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Clement Lenglet, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Carles Alena is the substitute for Barcelona.
So close for Osasuna as Roberto Torres's shot comes back off the post.
In the minute 68, Osasuna pushes forward through Roberto Torres, whose finish on goal is saved.
Barcelona are caught offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Osasuna in Barcelona.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 73, Lionel Messi puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-0.
That's a fine assist from Trincao.
In the minute 74, At Camp Nou, Lionel Messi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick Osasuna.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
Osasuna needs to be cautious. Barcelona have an attacking throw-in.
The away team have replaced Ruben Garcia with Enrique Barja. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jagoba Arrasate.
In the minute 77, Enric Gallego is replacing Ante Budimir for the away team.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Osasuna drives forward and Enrique Barja gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Osasuna territory.
Osasuna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In Barcelona Osasuna drive forward through Enrique Barja. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Barcelona's Ousmane Dembele gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Osasuna goal kick.
Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Osasuna.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards Osasuna a goal kick.
Free kick for Osasuna in their own half.
At Camp Nou, Osasuna are penalized for being offside.
Barcelona are pushing forward but Trincao's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Osasuna at Camp Nou.
Can Barcelona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Lionel Messi of Barcelona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
The match is over. Final score 4-0.
